titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: S CATEGORY CODE - National Codes

strow.stentry: LDH - Marker studies not available or not performed; HCG - Marker studies not available or not performed; AFP - Marker studies not available or not performed
LDH - Normal; HCG - Normal; AFP - Normal
LDH - Less than 1.5 x normal; HCG - Less than 5,000; AFP - Less than 1,000
LDH - Greater than 10 x normal; HCG - Greater than 50,000; AFP - Greater than 10,000
